name: Arrow knight (noograss)
description:
The day has come!
You've been chosen to protect your realm against the Gustav' Ruler of the Unknown.

Fight infinite waves of monsters using your magnificent bow. Learn new skills along the way by visiting Hubert, owner of "Le skill shop".

In this Vampire Survivor clone, you are matched against other players (not yet implemented). Send monsters to the other realms (other players) to overwhelm them. Hubert will help you in your endeavor by upgrading your stuff and the monster you banish to the other worlds.

[May contain bugs and other odities]

No optimization has been done yet, so it could be lagging after a while

Pixel art are temporary (made by me :D) using Piskel https://www.piskelapp.com/
